section1.title: What is MirrorBuddy
section1.content1: MirrorBuddy is a free app that uses artificial intelligence to help children and teenagers study.
section1.content2: It's a project of the FightTheStroke Foundation, created by people who want to make learning more accessible to everyone.

section2.title: What we promise
section2.item1: Do our best to create a useful tool
section2.item3: Listen to your feedback and improve
section2.item4: Be transparent about how it works

school.heading: We're not a school
school.content: MirrorBuddy helps with studying, but it doesn't replace teachers and schools.

ai.heading: AI can make mistakes
ai.content: Artificial intelligence is good but not perfect. Always check important answers with an adult or a book.

beta.heading: It's a free beta service
beta.content: We do our best, but the service might not always work or it might change.

section4.title: AI Professors
section4.intro: MirrorBuddy includes virtual professors inspired by historical and contemporary figures. Here's what you should know:

educational.heading: Purely educational purpose
educational.content: AI professors are created exclusively for educational and demonstration purposes. They do not represent real people and are not affiliated with or endorsed by them.

changeable.heading: Professors can change
changeable.content: The list of available professors may vary over time. Some may be replaced or removed.

demo.heading: Demonstration version
demo.content: This version serves to demonstrate the platform's capabilities. In the future, each student will be able to create their own custom professors, freely choosing names and avatars.

section5.title: If something goes wrong
section5.intro: MirrorBuddy is free and made with love. We can't be responsible if:
section5.item1: The AI gives a wrong answer
section5.item2: The service doesn't work for a while
section5.item3: You don't pass an exam (studying is still essential!)
section5.item4: Something happens while you use the app
section5.note: This doesn't mean we don't care - we care deeply! But legally we need to protect ourselves to continue helping.

section6.title: We ask you to...
section6.intro: To make everything work well, we ask you to:

respect.label: Use MirrorBuddy with respect
respect.content: towards the app and towards others

noAbuse.label: Don't try to "cheat" the AI
noAbuse.content: don't make it say bad or dangerous things

report.label: Report problems to us
report.content: if something's wrong, let us know: info@fightthestroke.org

section7.title: For parents and guardians
section7.intro: If your child is under 14 years old:

supervise.label: We ask you to supervise
supervise.content: stay nearby while they use the app

contact.label: Talk to us if you have doubts

section8.title: Your data
section8.intro: We treat your data with respect. For all details, read the
section8.item1: We collect only what we need
section8.item2: We don't sell your data to anyone

section9.title: Can we block you?
section9.item2: You try to harm other users
section9.note: Before blocking you, we'll try to talk to you. We're not here to punish, we're here to help.

section10.title: Changes to these terms
section10.item2: We'll ask you to accept again

section11.title: Law and court
section11.line2: If we really can't resolve a problem by talking, the competent court is the one in Milan.

page.title: MirrorBuddy Cookie Policy
page.contactQuestion: Questions about cookies? Write to us

tldr.heading: In short (TL;DR)
tldr.point4: Sub-processors (Vercel, Azure, Supabase) don't use cookies

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies
whatAreCookies.p1: Cookies are small text files that websites save on your device (computer, phone, tablet). They help remember useful information, like whether you've already logged in.
whatAreCookies.p2: Think of cookies like sticky notes that the website leaves on your browser to remember you.

whichCookies.title: Which cookies we use
whichCookies.intro: MirrorBuddy uses only two types of cookies
whichCookies.essentialDesc: needed to make the app work
whichCookies.analyticsDesc: help us understand if the app works well
whichCookies.disclaimer: We NEVER use advertising cookies. Never. We have no ads.

essentialCookies.title: Essential cookies
essentialCookies.intro: These cookies are necessary to use MirrorBuddy. You can't disable them because without them the app wouldn't work.
essentialCookies.note: The authentication cookie uses HMAC-SHA256 signature to prevent tampering. The httpOnly flag protects against unauthorized JavaScript access.

metricsAnalytics.title: Metrics and analytics
metricsAnalytics.p1: MirrorBuddy doesn't use third-party analytics cookies. Your cookie preferences are saved in the browser (localStorage), not in a cookie.
metricsAnalytics.p2: We collect technical metrics (Web Vitals) to understand if the app works well. These metrics are
metricsAnalytics.serverSideDesc: no analytics cookies installed on your browser
metricsAnalytics.gdprCompliantDesc: data processed according to Privacy Policy
metricsAnalytics.readMore: For more details, read the "Performance Metrics" section in the

cookieManagement.title: How to manage cookies
cookieManagement.settingsDesc: You can manage analytics cookies directly from the app. Go to settings and look for the "Privacy and Cookies" section.
cookieManagement.browserDesc: You can also manage cookies from your browser settings. Here's how in the most common browsers
cookieManagement.chromeDesc: Settings â†’ Privacy and security â†’ Cookies
cookieManagement.safariDesc: Preferences â†’ Privacy â†’ Manage website data
cookieManagement.edgeDesc: Settings â†’ Cookies and site permissions
cookieManagement.warningText: If you block all cookies, MirrorBuddy may not work properly. We recommend allowing at least essential cookies.

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies and sub-processors
thirdParty.p1: MirrorBuddy doesn't use third-party cookies for advertising or tracking.
thirdParty.p2: Our technical service providers (sub-processors) don't install cookies on your device
thirdParty.vercelDesc: application hosting (no cookies, no analytics installed)
thirdParty.sentryDesc: error and performance monitoring (uses localStorage for Session Replay on errors, no cookies)
thirdParty.googleDriveDesc: If you connect your Google account to save documents, Google may set its own cookies during OAuth authentication. Access tokens are encrypted and saved in our database, not in browser cookies.
thirdParty.seeMore: For the complete list of sub-processors, see the

duration.title: How long they stay
duration.sessionDesc: disappear when you close the browser
duration.delete: You can delete all cookies anytime from your browser settings.

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.intro: If we change this Cookie Policy
changes.point3: If the changes are important, we'll ask you to accept them again

userId.purpose: Authentication: remembers who you are (cryptographically signed, httpOnly)

userIdClient.purpose: Readable copy of your ID for client-side functions (no sensitive data)

accessibility.cerebralSimplifiedUIDesc: Reduces visual elements to minimize cognitive overload
accessibility.motorDesc: Settings for users with motor difficulties or limited control.
accessibility.motorLargeClickTargetsDesc: Increases virtual button sizes to minimum 44x44px

accessibility.motorAdjustableTimeoutDesc: Allows adjusting or disabling inactivity timeouts

accessibility.visualHighContrastDesc: Increases color contrast for better readability
accessibility.visualFocusIndicatorsDesc: Shows clear highlighting of active element
accessibility.visualWCAGCompliance: WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance: All settings respect accessibility requirements for visually impaired users.
accessibility.dyslexiaLineHeightText: Text with increased line height to improve readability. Each line has more vertical space between them.

tldr.heading: In short (TL;DR)
tldr.point1: MirrorBuddy uses AI (Azure OpenAI) for teaching, not for decision-making
tldr.point2: The 22 AI Maestri have verified and controlled knowledge
tldr.point3: Teachers always see all chats and can intervene
tldr.point4: You can refuse AI whenever you want, without consequences
tldr.point5: We comply with GDPR and Italian privacy law

contact.text: Questions about AI in MirrorBuddy? Write to us: compliance@mirrorbuddy.it

section1.title: What AI Does in MirrorBuddy?
section1.para1: MirrorBuddy uses artificial intelligence (AI) to provide a personalized educational experience. The 22 AI Maestri (virtual tutors) are designed to teach, explain difficult concepts, create quizzes, mind maps, and flashcards.
section1.para2: Important: AI does NOT decide your grade, does NOT evaluate your disability, and does NOT replace your teachers. Teachers remain always the primary responsible for evaluation and pedagogical decisions.

section2.title: The AI System
section2.intro: MirrorBuddy uses Azure OpenAI (GPT-4), a state-of-the-art language model developed by OpenAI and hosted in Microsoft's European data centers.
section2.subtitle: How It Works:
section2.item1Desc: When you write a question, the model analyzes the text and generates a response based on its training
section2.item2Desc: The 22 Maestri have embedded knowledge bases - libraries of knowledge controlled and verified by experts - that limit what they can say
section2.item3Desc: Each response can be reviewed by teachers and parents through the control dashboard

section3.title: The 22 AI Maestri
section3.intro: MirrorBuddy has 22 virtual tutors specialized in different subjects. Each Maestro has an authentic personality and verified knowledge in their field.
section3.subtitle: Categories of Maestri:
section3.category1: Science and Mathematics: Euclide (Geometry), Galileo (Astronomy), Feynman (Physics), Curie (Chemistry), Darwin (Biology)
section3.category2: Languages and Humanities: Manzoni (Italian), Shakespeare (English), Alex Pina (Spanish), Omero (Storytelling)
section3.category3: Society and Environment: Cicerone (Civic Education), Smith (Economics), Humboldt (Geography), Erodoto (History)
section3.category4: Art, Music, and Wellness: Leonardo (Art), Mozart (Music), Ippocrate (Health), Chris (Physical Education), Simone (Sport)
section3.category5: Specialist Disciplines: Lovelace (Computer Science), Socrate (Philosophy), Cassese (International Law)
section3.outro: Each Maestro has a unique voice (both text and audio), a personalized teaching style, and can access tools like quizzes, flashcards, mind maps, and PDFs to teach effectively.

section4.title: Your Protections
section4.subtitle: 5-Level Safety System:
section4.protection1Desc: You'll always know when you're talking to AI. A banner reminds you in every chat.
section4.protection2Desc: Teachers and parents see all your chats and can intervene at any time
section4.protection3Desc: AI will never generate violent, explicit, or age-inappropriate content
section4.protection4Desc: You have a daily budget of AI interactions to prevent addiction and maintain focus
section4.protection5Desc: Both you and your parents must approve AI usage

section5.title: Your Rights
section5.intro: According to Italian law (Law 132/2025) and GDPR, you have the right to:
section5.right1Desc: Be informed whenever an automated system generates responses
section5.right2Desc: Receive clear explanations on how the AI Maestro chooses to respond
section5.right3Desc: You can choose to talk only with human teachers, without losing platform access
section5.right4Desc: Request a copy of all chats, feedback, and data that AI processed about you
section5.right5Desc: If data is inaccurate, you can ask for it to be corrected or deleted
section5.right6Desc: If you think AI doesn't respect your rights, you can report the issue

section6.title: How Your Data Is Protected
section6.intro: All data you share with Maestri is protected as required by GDPR (European privacy law):
section6.protection1Desc: Data is encrypted both in transit and when stored on servers
section6.protection2Desc: Your data is NEVER sold to third parties or used for advertising
section6.protection3Desc: Only MirrorBuddy and Microsoft (which hosts the servers) can access data
section6.protection4Desc: Data is kept only as long as necessary for education
section6.protection5Desc: You can request that all your data be deleted

section7.title: Risks and How We Manage Them
section7.intro: Like any AI, there are some risks. Here's how we address them:
section7.mitigation5: Daily budget, parental controls, opt-out option

section8.title: Legal Compliance
section8.intro: MirrorBuddy complies with the following European and Italian regulations:
section8.law1: AI Act (EU 2024/1689): European regulation on high-risk AI in education and child protection
section8.law2: Law 132/2025: Italian implementation of AI Act with user rights and provider responsibilities
section8.law3: GDPR (EU 2016/679): Personal data protection and privacy
section8.law4: Italian Privacy Code: National implementation of data protection
section8.classification: MirrorBuddy is classified as a high-risk AI system because it supports the learning of minors with cognitive difficulties. Consequently, we implement rigorous measures of transparency, supervision, and protection.

section9.title: Report Issues
section9.intro: If you have concerns about how MirrorBuddy uses AI, contact us:
section9.authorityValue: You can also contact directly the Privacy Guarantor (www.garanteprivacy.it)
section9.commitment: We respond to all complaints within 30 business days.

section10.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section10.faq1Title: Does AI read my chats with my friends?
section10.faq1Answer: No. AI only sees chats that happen within MirrorBuddy when you talk with Maestri. Your private conversations outside MirrorBuddy remain private.
section10.faq2Title: Can I delete my chats with Maestri?
section10.faq2Answer: Yes. You can delete individual chats from your dashboard. If you want to delete everything, you can request the 'right to be forgotten' through the compliance email address.
section10.faq3Title: Does AI know my diagnoses (Dyslexia, ADHD, etc.)?
section10.faq3Answer: Only if you choose to share them in your profile. MirrorBuddy doesn't automatically collect medical diagnoses, but Maestri can personalize teaching if they know your learning needs.
section10.faq4Title: What happens if AI makes a mistake?
section10.faq4Answer: Report it to your teacher, who can mark the response as incorrect. This helps improve the Maestro. Additionally, teachers can always correct or supplement the AI's explanation.
section10.faq5Title: How can I refuse to use AI?
section10.faq5Answer: Go to account settings and disable 'Use AI Maestri'. You'll still have access to all other MirrorBuddy tools (resources, notes, etc.), and you can talk directly with your teachers.

section11.title: Latest Updates
section11.intro: This page is updated with the latest information on AI compliance. Please check periodically for any changes in the systems used or regulations.

page.title: Compliance & Transparency
page.subtitle: MirrorBuddy is designed in compliance with European and Italian regulations on artificial intelligence and data protection.

sections.documentation: Detailed documentation available in the open source repository.

contact.title: Questions about Compliance?
contact.text: For questions about privacy, data protection, or AI compliance, contact us:

emptyState.startCreating: Start creating study materials with the Masters! Go to the Toolcase to choose a tool.

locales.search: Search by country code, name, locale or maestro...

trial-budget.title: Trial Budget
trial-budget.description-text: This amount defines the maximum monthly budget limit for trial users. The value is read from the environment variable and cannot be modified from this interface.

table.name: Name
table.search: Search by code, name or description...

form.codeReadOnly: Code cannot be modified after creation
form.name: Name
form.chatMessagesHelp: Maximum number of messages a user can send per day
form.voiceMinutesHelp: Voice usage minutes available per day for the user
form.toolsHelp: Maximum number of tools that can be used per day
form.docsHelp: Maximum number of documents a user can upload in total

analytics.title: Analytics per Tier
analytics.subtitle: Usage statistics aggregated for each pricing tier
analytics.note: "Active Users" are calculated based on activity in the last 7 days. "Activity Rate" indicates the percentage of tier users who were recently active.

auditLog.title: Tier Audit Log
auditLog.subtitle: Complete audit trail of all tier and subscription changes

directInviteModal.successMessage: The user has been created and will receive an email with access credentials.
directInviteModal.emailHelpText: The user will receive an email with username and temporary password to sign in.

localeFormFields.countryCodeHelp: Two uppercase letters (e.g: IT, FR, DE, ES)
localeFormFields.primaryLocaleHelp: ISO 639-1 language code (e.g: it, en, fr, de, es)
localeFormFields.maestroHelp: The maestro who will teach the country's primary language
localeFormFields.secondaryLocalesHelp: Separated by comma (e.g: en, de, fr)

analytics.willDeleteAllStats: This action will delete ALL statistics and activity data:
analytics.userAccountsWillRemain: User accounts and profiles WILL REMAIN intact.

sentry.notConfigured: Sentry not configured. Add SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN to environment variables.

page.title: Contact Us
page.subtitle: Describe your topic and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.successMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you soon.
form.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again later.

enterprise.successDescription: Our team will contact you soon to discuss your needs.

ambientAudio.title: Ambient Audio
ambientAudio.info: Ambient audio can improve focus while studying. Binaural beats require stereo headphones for optimal effect.

dashboard.configureAzure: Configure Azure credentials to see costs

google-drive.description: Link Google Drive to import study materials directly from the cloud
google-drive.readOnlyAccess: Read-only access to Google Drive files
google-drive.disconnectWarning: You won't be able to import files from Google Drive. You can reconnect your account at any time.
google-drive.connectPrompt: Link your Google account to import files
google-drive.capabilityPdf: Import PDFs for the Study Kit
google-drive.capabilityHomework: Upload homework photos from Google Drive
google-drive.privacyNotice: Privacy: MirrorBuddy only requires read-only access to your files. We don't modify or delete anything.

uploadProgress.processingNote: This process may take a few minutes. You can close this window and come back later.

exportModal.title: Export Accessible PDF
exportModal.description: Select a DSA profile to optimize the PDF

success.withZaino: PDF downloaded and saved to Backpack

list.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"?
list.deleteError: Error during deletion. Please try again.

empty.title: No Study Kits found
empty.description: Upload a PDF to get started

processing.title: Generation in progress...
processing.description: This process may take a few minutes

error.title: Generation failed
error.description: You can delete this Study Kit and try again with another file.

view.subtitle: Upload a PDF and generate summaries, mind maps, demos and quizzes

stickyKeysHelper.description: Keys remain active until pressed again

leftOnly.label: Left only
leftOnly.description: For users with only their left hand

rightOnly.label: Right only
rightOnly.description: For users with only their right hand

info.description: The virtual keyboard will show only keys for the selected hand. Lessons have been modified for efficient single-hand typing.
tipItems: Position your hand in the center of the keyboard
Use Sticky Keys for key combinations

stickyKeys.tip: For more efficient typing, enable Sticky Keys in your operating system's accessibility settings.
stickyKeys.unsupported: Sticky Keys are not available on this operating system
stickyKeys.title: Sticky Keys
stickyKeys.description: Sticky Keys allows you to press modifier keys (Shift, Ctrl, Alt, Cmd) one at a time instead of holding them down.

compliance.modelCardDesc: Technical specifications of the AI system, performance and limitations
compliance.aiLiteracyDesc: Educational guide on how AI works and how to use it critically
compliance.biasAuditDesc: Fairness and non-discrimination analysis of the AI system
compliance.riskManagementDesc: Risk management framework and AI risk register
